extendedInfo.description: A simple but engaging game of word search for kids aged 4-7. The game consists of 20 levels, each with 9 words to find. The words range from 3 to 5 letters. Words can be found across, down or diagonal.  Even preschool children can get a jump learning with the fun activity of finding words.KW: game,education,spelling,find,pbs,activities,preschool,children,learning,crosswords,Fun,toddler,abc,wordfind

reviews.title: Good for kids
reviews.comment: On level 7(did not check all levels), PET can be selected in two ways but it only accepts one way. A part from that it is good.
reviews.author: Ahmed Tanvir Chowdhury

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: ILOVEIT LOL IDO SOGOOD. MAN DUDE OR DUDET
reviews.author: Frankie Peters

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: After installing this app my son doesn\'t put my phone aside for once and I also don\'t bother as he is learning through it.
reviews.author: Fahim Ahmed

reviews.comment: Great app....my 4yr old Loves it!! And it helping with word reconition
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'d give a 0 Star if I could
reviews.comment: Game didn\'t even work once I couldn\'t uninstall it fast enough also I agree with the user bad because you cannot cross the words off
reviews.author: Elizabeth Boisvert

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Can find the words but cant cross them off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My Kids Love It
reviews.comment: My son loves this game.  He is 7 and a lot of the words in the game are ones he is learning in school for his spelling tests.  The sound you hear and words of encouragement go a long way as well.  Looking forward to more kids apps from this Developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for restaurants
reviews.comment: My kids love racing each other with word searches when we go out to eat.  But some places don\'t have them on the kid\'s menus.  So this app comes in very handy when that happens!  Keeps them occupied and entertained!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superbly fast
reviews.comment: It is a small size game and superbly fast. Its very hard to hold kids\' concentration but this game successfully  did it.
reviews.author: Savvy Donald

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Love the way this app works. My kids are in need of some more levels. They have finished it already!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thumbs up!
reviews.comment: The whole idea and concept of this kids game is excellent. I wonder how come this kind of an idea comes to anyone\'s mind!
reviews.author: Jefferson Kal

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This is a game to die for. It is apt for my niece as she is very naughty and mischievous,doesn\'t have any interest in learning.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Rocking
reviews.comment: Another rocking application from this rocking developer. want some more kids friendly applications and games from You.  Ummmaaah :-* :-*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fascinating Game
reviews.comment: I was searching for this kind of games.  Now it is easy to learn something from a game. My kids are game lover, they will be happy playing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute game!
reviews.comment: Very cute game but very essential for children. It has become my daughter\'s first priority. She is in love with it.
reviews.author: Ashfaq Kabir

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: There are many games for kids but not every game is suitable for them. In my opinion this game is the best kid game till date.
reviews.author: Ian Harvey

reviews.title: Simple yet engaging
reviews.comment: A simple but engaging game of word search for kids aged 4-7. I have two kids and this game is apt for them.
reviews.author: Jason Milton

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Thanks for developing such an amazing game for my kids :) Thanks for making it free and available on Play Store. I tried this kind of app on my iPhone and eagerly waiting one for Android. Now I have it. Recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best One
reviews.comment: I have tried some other similar apps, but this one deserves the best. As it has sound playback option :) :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: Searching words from bunches of letters,its very exciting. I also play this game with my little sister. She loves it and I also love it.
reviews.author: A Google User
